tool_description: Identifies trending topics, hashtags, and content themes across multiple platforms and industries to inform content strategy and capitalize on emerging opportunities.

industry_keywords.description: Industry-related keywords and topics to monitor

platforms.description: Social media platforms to analyze (twitter, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

geographic_region.description: Geographic focus region (global, US, EU, APAC, etc.)

exclude_keywords.description: Keywords to exclude from trend analysis

error_messages: Insufficient keywords: Provide at least 3 industry keywords for effective trend analysis.
Unsupported platform: Use supported platforms (twitter, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube).
Invalid geographic region: Use recognized regions (global, US, EU, APAC, etc.).
Invalid trend velocity: Choose from emerging, growing, or viral.
usage: Provide industry_keywords and platforms to monitor. Optionally set geographic_region, trend_velocity, and exclude_keywords. Returns trending topics and content opportunities.

trend_momentum.description: Growth trajectory analysis for each trend
